page.title: 17LEISURE
page.content: There are lots of clubs in Lenham such as Lenham Swimming club which opens six days a week. There is also a youth club called the Twilight club. Drinks and crisps are available at the Swimming club and the Twilight club.In Lenham there are Brownies,Cubs and Guides.In Brownies there are first and second groups but Cubs only have second Lenham Cubs. Guides have first and second groups as well. For boys there is the Lenham Wanderers Football Club which is for players aged between 8 and 40. There are lots of grown up clubs such as the Lenham Cricket Club, Bowls Club, Royal British Legion, Womens' Institute and Mothers' Union. There is also a Working Men's Club where they play darts and bingo. They have a licence to sell alcohol.
